import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './NavBar.css' import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { resetState } from '../redux/slices/userauthorslice' import { FaHome } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaSignInAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import { RiContactsFill } from "react-icons/ri"; function NavBar() { let {isLogined,currentUser}=useSelector(state=>state.userAuthorReducer) let dispatch=useDispatch() function SignOut(){ //remove the token from the local storage localStorage.removeItem('token') dispatch(resetState()) } return (
